parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese.
*   en: English.

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the service source.

parameters.name: PathList
parameters.description: An array of service root paths.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
The service source. Valid values:

*   K8s: ACK cluster.
*   MSE: Nacos instance.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the service source. Valid values:

*   K8s: ACK cluster.
*   NACOS: Nacos instance.
